paragraphs.body: I think this is pretty straight forward. Considering there are now, only 4 rollback users. Twilit, Bos, Dc, and Purugas, I don't see why they can't have a template like the admins, fanonadmins,etc. do.--Avatar Talk 04:36, January 31, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Oh, my mistake. Also, I'd go with no. Joey aa 05:04, January 31, 2010 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Oh, my mistake. Also, I'd go with no. Joey aa 05:04, January 31, 2010 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: The Administrators template is used to ease navigation to admins and their talk pages. Why? If there is any type of problem it can be solved through the administrators, regardless of whether it's a HTML/wikitext/CSS/javascript question, a problem user or vandal, or bug. Why not to rollback users? Having rollback means the user is there to protect the wiki from vandalism. There isn't much logic to directing new users to those who have experience in removing vandalism when it's easier for them to catch an admin and less confusing. Do you see what I mean? Joey aa 05:23, January 31, 2010 (UTC)

There isn't much logic to directing new users to those who have experience in removing vandalism when it's easier for them to catch an admin and less confusing. Do you see what I mean?
